titleStmt.title: Loveday's letters domestick and forrein. To several persons, occasionally distributed in subjects philosophicall, historicall & morall, / by R. Loveday Gent. the late translator of the three first parts of Cleopatra.
titleStmt.author: Loveday, Robert, fl. 1655.
